description: Provides help information for jec commands.
Gets the current JEC CLI version.
Gets the default GlassCat version used to install GlassCat servers.
Installs a new a GlassCat server in the current directory.

options.name: env
options.description: Defines which setup to use for the server environment.

options.name: version
options.description: Defines a specific version of the GlassCat server to install.

description: Creates a new a JEC bootstrap class.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the bootstrap class.

options.name: index
options.description: Specifies the position of the bootstrap class instance in the bootstrap files execution queue.

options.name: disabled
options.description: Indicates wheter the bootstrap class instance is ignored at the server start (true), or not (false).

description: Creates a new a JEC jslet class.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the jslet class.

options.name: urlPatterns
options.description: The patterns associated with the jslet to specify URL mapping.

options.name: template
options.description: The template file associated with this jslet.

description: Creates a new a JEC interface.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the interface.

options.name: pkg
options.description: The name of the package for this interface.

description: Creates a JUTA test suite for the specified class

options.name: class
options.description: Indicates the class for which to create the test suite.

description: Creates a new a JARS resource class.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the resource class.

options.name: path
options.description: The path used to declare the resource.

options.name: rootPathRefs
options.description: The list of references that specify all enable versions of the resource

description: Creates a new a JARS root path.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the root path.

options.name: ref
options.description: The reference used to identify the root path.

options.name: path
options.description: The path used to define a specific versioned route.

options.name: prefix
options.description: The prefix used to define a unique versioned route. Default value is 'v'

options.name: major
options.description: The major version number used to define a unique versioned route. Default value is '1'

options.name: minor
options.description: The major minor number used to define a unique versioned route. Default value is '0'
